title: Vic Fangio, NBA, 49ers, Aaron Rodgers
itunes:title: Vic Fangio, NBA, 49ers, Aaron Rodgers
description:
Colin talks about the recent comments by Broncos HC Vic Fangio, the return of the NBA and its possible rule changes, what he likes about the 49ers, and why he doesn't agree with Pro Football Focus' ranking of Aaron Rodgers. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Chris Haynes, Rich Kleiman, and Mark Schlereth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
